Written by Brandon King · Published Oct 24, 2016

New titles from Lee Child, Zadie Smith and Jodi Picoult

Alice Through the Looking Glass

Written by Brandon King · Published May 24, 2016

The new Alice Through the Looking Glass film, released by Walt Disney Pictures on May 27 2016, is based on Through the Looking-Glass by Lewis Carroll and is the sequel to the 2010 film Alice in Wonderland. In honour of the latest film, here are some Alice related books and DVDs to investigate.

Written by Brandon King · Published May 3, 2016

Featuring Peter James and Marina Lewycka.

New fiction for April 2016

Written by Brandon King · Published Mar 31, 2016

New novels from Joanne Harris, David Baldacci and Irvine Welsh.
